mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM t_home_news t WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG='1'

SELECT t.ID id, t.NEWS_TITLE newsTitle, t.NEWS_DETAILS newsDetails, t.PICTURE_PATH picturePath, t.CREATE_USER_ID createUserId, t.CREATE_DATA createDate, t.UPDATE_USER_ID updateUserId, t.UPDATE_DATA updateDate FROM t_home_news t WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG='1' ORDER BY t.CREATE_DATA LIMIT #{rows} OFFSET #{page}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_home_notice ( NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_DETAILS, CREATE_USER_ID, CREATE_DATA ) VALUE ( #{noticeTitle}, #{noticeDetails}, #{createUserId}, NOW() )
mapper.update: UPDATE t_home_notice SET NOTICE_TITLE=#{noticeTitle}, NOTICE_DETAILS=#{noticeDetails}, UPDATE_USER_ID=#{updateUserId}, UPDATE_DATA=NOW() WHERE ID=#{id}
UPDATE t_home_notice SET DELETE_FLAG='0', UPDATE_USER_ID=#{updateUserId}, UPDATE_DATA=NOW() WHERE ID=#{id}
